title: Booki
description: Description : The company aims to create a user-friendly website that enables users to easily discover and book accommodations and activities in their desired city.
mission: Mission : Implementing the website interface using HTML and CSS and adhering to the design mockup.
skills: Setting up a front-end development environment
Using GitHub and versioning a project with git and GitHub
Implementing a responsive interface using HTML and CSS
Integrating content according to an HTML and CSS design

title: Sophie Bluel
description: Description : ArchiWebos agency is responsible for designing the portfolio website of interior architect Sophie Bluel.
position: Position : Front-end Developer assisting a team at the agency
mission: Mission : Developing the architect's work presentation page, the site administrator's login page, and the modal for uploading new media.
skills: Retrieving user data in JavaScript using forms

title: Nina Carducci
description: Description : As a freelance developer, I provide SEO optimization services, and Nina Carducci has expressed interest in availing them.
mission: Mission : Improving the performance, SEO and accessibility of her website, as well as fixing bugs.
skills: Creating a test plan to validate website functionality

title: Kasa
description: Description : Kasa is one of the leaders in peer-to-peer apartment rentals in France. They have launched a complete overhaul to transition to a full JavaScript stack with Node.js on the backend and React on the frontend.
mission: Mission :  Initiating the React project and developing the entire application, including components and routes, adhering the provided design mockup.
skills: Initializing an application with React App
Configuring navigation between application pages with React Router
Developing website interface elements using React components

title: Mon vieux Grimoire
description: Description : Le Vieux Grimoire is a small bookstore chain located in Lille that wants to launch a website for book reference and rating.
mission: Mission : Collaborating with a front-end developer to combine our skills on a new project called Mon Vieux Grimoire. My responsibility is to develop the entire back-end part.
skills: Implementing a logical data model in compliance with regulations
Storing data and implementing secure CRUD operations
